0.name: Ode to Caress and Cicatrix
0.fullDesc:
Regenerates Energy by {{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of Max Energy for one designated ally character, and turns the target and their summon into "The Beatified." "The Beatified" have their CRIT DMG increased by an amount equal to {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of Sunday's CRIT DMG plus {{4, percent(fixed: 1)}}%.
At the start of Sunday's each turn, the duration of "The Beatified" decreases by 1 turn, lasting for a total of {{3}} turn(s). And it only takes effect on the most recent target of the Ultimate (excluding Sunday himself). When Sunday is knocked down, "The Beatified" will also be dispelled.
